snippet: The campaign was prompted in part by the recent bombing of a Russian airliner in Egypt and the downing of a Russian warplane by Turkey.
abstract: Israeli tourism officials begin campaign to entice Russian tourists by promoting Israel as alternative to Turkey and Egypt; marketing scheme was spurred by Russia’s suspension of flights to and from Egypt and its imposition of sanctions on Turkey.
lead_paragraph: The campaign was prompted in part by the recent bombing of a Russian airliner in Egypt and the downing of a Russian warplane by Turkey.

headline.main: Israel: Campaign Aims to Attract Russian Tourists
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Israel: Campaign Aims to Attract Russian Tourists
